Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2010 08:06PM jnetzful wrote: I get my BRAC 1 & 2 Testing done tomorrow morning... we have 8 women in my family (so far) who have had breast cancer--ages 34-78 when first diagnosed. With three daughters and two granddaughters to now think about, I'm going through with the testing just to find out on their behalf. It costs $3,300 to do the testing and you can get your insurance company to agree to pay for it if you meet their conditions. Wish us all luck!
Posts.Title: 3 generations BC, my diagnosis...should I be aggressive? Enilorac jnetzful
